Kybernaut

𓎡 𓃀 𓈖 𓏏 𓊛 | (seagoing) ship | kabanit > shiphonit ship boat naut 𓎡 𓃀 𓈖 𓈉 | (locality) Byblos | Kabana Quban 𒁺𒆷 GIN.LA #Gubla גבל 𐤂𐤁𐤋 GBL Gebal ⇔ Kübel 𓎡

Kahn

𓂙 खेवना khevnā खियाउनु khiyāunu 𓂙 खेना khenā "convey, row" 𓄡 𓈖 / 𓄚 𓈖 / 𓂙 𓈖 𓎸 𓊛 Kahn "barge" (𓎸 can/beer…) 𓎛 𓂝 𓅱 𓊛 Kahn canoe < •kavn 𓎡 𓃀 𓈖 𓊛 𓎡 𓆑 𓍘 𓅱 𓊛 Kutter ( sea-going ship ) via 𓎡 𓆑 𓅂 𓈉 Krete

P1 𓊛 syra סירה زورق sourok 𓊛 Barkasse barka=ferry ++ 𓊜back
P2 𓊝 shâphoina ال سفينة ship/boat 𓊡 phn vent phoenix phain 𓅷 𓍑 𓆑 𓅮fleet
P3 𓊞 𓊟 ⋍ P30 araboan אניה ania⇔ny:naut 𓈖 navi 𓎛𓂝𓅱𓊞𓏥

𓄿 𓏏 𓊪 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓀋 | cargo | ad.phoid ⇔ φόρη port @ boat
